original_text: And God said to Solomon, Because this was in thine heart, and thou hast not asked riches, wealth, or honour, nor the life of thine enemies, neither yet hast asked long life; but hast asked wisdom and knowledge for thyself, that thou mayest judge my people, over whom I have made thee king:
korean_text: 하나님이 솔로몬에게 이르시되 이런 마음이 네게 있어서 부나 재물이나 영광이나 원수의 생명 멸하기를 구하지 아니하며 장수도 구하지 아니하고 오직 내가 네게 다스리게 한 내 백성을 재판하기 위하여 지혜와 지식을 구하였으니

sentences.original_text: Because this was in thine heart
and thou hast not asked riches, wealth, or honour
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 재물과 부와 영광을 구하지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: nor the life of thine enemies
neither yet hast asked long life
but hast asked wisdom and knowledge for thyself
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 지혜와 지식을 너를 위하여 구하였으니

sentences.original_text: that thou mayest judge my people
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 나의 백성을 재판하게 하려 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: over whom I have made thee king:
